backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, leadership word submissions with counting, and resilient leadership activity submissions with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON list summarizing major frontend files, their purposes, and recent updates to content, routing, and activity behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all app routes and wrapping them in the themed AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with header, navigation, Internet Identity auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Displays top submitted leadership words using a dynamic bar chart fed by backend counts.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays community micro‑solutions with loading, empty, and list states using data from useMicroSolutions.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Provides a styled section wrapper component with configurable class names.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Shows a sign‑in prompt using Internet Identity when the user is not authenticated, otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Exports structured proposal content including metadata, bio, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Defines and exports a typed, ordered list of reference entries for use across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words, micro‑solutions, activity data, and quotes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays two activity cards with titles, goals, descriptions, and links to their respective activity pages.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1 form flow for submitting a leadership word, generating an affirmation, and fetching a quote with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 form logic for submitting a resilience scenario, validating inputs, and retrieving a supporting quote.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Shows the author's bio, organization, international experience, and social profile links.
Lists session learning outcomes pulled from proposalContent with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Renders the hero banner, abstract content, and links to activities and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Displays a styled list of reference entries from the REFERENCES dataset.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty page placeholder for future session outline content.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder intended for slide deck or presentation content.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Presents key takeaways with titles and descriptions sourced from proposalContent.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Builds leadership affirmation messages using templates keyed by traits and user inputs with reference citations.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Generates a citation and validation message for micro-solutions by matching themes to reference keys.
Maps stable UI challenge-type keys to backend enum variants.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts backend quote genre enums into readable franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Provides a list of curated Star Wars quotes and a deterministic quote selector.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into concise user-friendly messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s version, high‑level summary, and a list of existing features with IDs, descriptions, and versioning metadata. It captures both frontend and backend capabilities including routing, styling, authentication, access control, and admin bootstrap flows.
